== Prerequisites == 
  # Visual Studio 2010 / SharePoint 2010 Environment 
 
== Step 1. Template Installation ==
  # Download VSIX file from (http://code.google.com/p/visual-studio-sharepoint-project-template/downloads/detail?name=SharePoint%20Starter%20Project.VSIX)
  # Double click the downloded file. It will open the POP-UP like below screen shot <br>
    http://visual-studio-sharepoint-project-template.googlecode.com/svn/Install1.png
  # Click Install button for installing this template. After installation it will show message as mentioned in below screen shot <br/>
	http://visual-studio-sharepoint-project-template.googlecode.com/svn/Install2.png
  # You can verify your newly installed template in Visual Studio by following steps<br/>
		Open VS 2010 -> File -> New -> Project -> Visual C# -> SharePoint -> 2010
	<br/> http://visual-studio-sharepoint-project-template.googlecode.com/svn/Install3.png

== Step 2. Template Deletion ==
  # Open VS 2010 -> Tools -> Extension Manager <br>
    http://visual-studio-sharepoint-project-template.googlecode.com/svn/Delete1.png
  # Select your custom template and click Uninstall or Disable as per your desired action <br/> 
	http://visual-studio-sharepoint-project-template.googlecode.com/svn/Delete2.png
 
== Step 3. Template Usage ==

  # Open VS 2010 -> File -> New -> Project -> Visual C#-> SharePoint -> 2010 -> Select Template <br/> 
	http://visual-studio-sharepoint-project-template.googlecode.com/svn/Usage1.png 
  # Provide Name and select Location and click OK. It will create project as per you input as mentioned in below screen shot <br/> 
    http://visual-studio-sharepoint-project-template.googlecode.com/svn/Usage2.png
